name: Best Bitter Melon Recipe With Egg
description: This bitter melon with egg and shrimp recipe is quick and easy, ready in under 20 minutes, and perfect as a side dish or light Thai dinner.
recipeIngredient: 150 g bitter melon (sliced into thin, crescent-shaped pieces (see ingredients photo))

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok or large pan over medium heat. Add the crushed garlic and sauté until fragrant and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a wok or large pan over medium heat. Add the crushed garlic and sauté until fragrant and golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the egg into the wok, let it cook undisturbed for a few seconds, and then gently scramble the egg until it is just set.
recipeInstructions.name: Crack the egg into the wok, let it cook undisturbed for a few seconds, and then gently scramble the egg until it is just set.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the shrimp to the wok and stir-fry until the shrimp turns pink and is cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the shrimp to the wok and stir-fry until the shrimp turns pink and is cooked through.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced bitter melon, light soy sauce, oyster sauce, water, white sugar, and white pepper. Stir-fry everything together until the bitter melon is tender but still slightly crisp. Serve hot with steamed rice. Enjoy!
